com.tomscz.afswinx.component

Class AFSwinxTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.tomscz.afswinx.component.abstraction.AFSwinxTopLevelComponent
              • com.tomscz.afswinx.component.AFSwinxTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AFSwinxInteraction, ComponentReserialization, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AFSwinxTable
extends AFSwinxTopLevelComponent
    This class represents table. This components hold widget and is able to get model and set data to model. This table is scrollable.
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • validateData

        public boolean validateData()
        Description copied from interface: AFSwinxInteraction
        This method validate all fields and if there is no valid field then return false. If there are no valid fields then message is show up
        Returns:
        true if data in fields are valid, false otherwise

      • resealize

        public AFDataHolder resealize()
        Description copied from interface: ComponentReserialization
        This method do back serialization. It create object which will hold all actual data in component.
        Returns:
        Object which hold all actual data in component. This object also preserve their hierarchy.

      • getComponentType

      • setColumnsWidths

        private void setColumnsWidths()
        This method set columns width based on longest value

      • resize

        public void resize()
        This method resize table. It works only if fit size attribute is set to true see #AFSwinxTable#setFitSize(boolean) . It also work with dynamic size attribute see setDynamicSize(boolean). If it is true then maximal size of table is set to 2000 and minimal on 15 otherwise are used attributes from current calculation.

      • getTableRow

        public java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getTableRow()

      • getSelectedData

        public java.util.List<AFDataPack> getSelectedData()
                                           throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        This method return actual data in selected row. If no row is selected then IndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown. This method could be used after sorting.
        Returns:
        Actual data in selected data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if not row is selected then this exception is thrown.

      • getTable

        public javax.swing.JTable getTable()
        This method return actual table.
        Returns:
        Table which were created.
